places.name: Gateway of India
places.description: Iconic stone arch overlooking the Arabian Sea.

places.name: Marine Drive
places.description: Stroll along this scenic promenade, also known as the Queen's Necklace.

places.name: Juhu Beach
places.description: Famous for its street food and lively atmosphere.

places.name: India Gate
places.description: A war memorial for soldiers of the British Indian Army.

places.name: Qutub Minar
places.description: A minaret and 'victory tower' that forms part of the Qutb complex.

places.name: Lalbagh Botanical Garden
places.description: A nationally renowned centre for botanical artwork.

places.name: Bangalore Palace
places.description: Equipped with magnificent woodcarvings and Tudor-style architecture.

places.name: Cubbon Park
places.description: A landmark 'lung' area of the city, with a rich recorded history.

places.name: Charminar
places.description: A monument and mosque, globally recognized structure of Hyderabad.

places.description: A citadel and fort that served as the capital of the medieval Qutb Shahi dynasty.

places.name: Marina Beach
places.description: The second longest urban beach in the world.

places.name: Kapaleeshwarar Temple
places.description: A classic example of Dravidian architecture.

places.name: Victoria Memorial
places.description: A large marble building dedicated to the memory of Queen Victoria.

places.name: Howrah Bridge

places.name: Adalaj Stepwell

places.description: A palace of winds with a high screen wall for the royal women.

places.name: Amber Fort
places.description: Known for its artistic Hindu style elements.

places.description: An urban beach along the Arabian Sea.

places.name: Sardar Patel Museum
places.description: A museum showcasing the history and culture of Surat.

places.description: An imambara complex in Lucknow, India, built by Asaf-ud-Daula.

places.name: Futala Lake

places.name: Kelwa Beach
places.description: A popular weekend getaway spot.

places.name: Sanchi Stupa

places.name: Rushikonda Beach

places.name: Kailasagiri
places.description: A hilltop park offering panoramic views of the city.

places.name: Golghar
